document_data.name: Protection From Possession, 10' Radius
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from possession, 10' radius''''' was a [[spell]] used by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell prevented the caster and all creatures within the protected area from being possessed. It protected against possession spells such as ''[[magic jar]]'', from [[psionic]]-based attacks and possession by a creature such as demonic possession. It created a small area of protection around the caster, {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}} in radius. This protected area moved with the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]]. A broken ''magic jar'', in which the fragments are used during the casting of this spell.The 2nd editon version of this spell used a smashed crystal or gem, the dust of which was sprinkled in a circle around those being protected.
